predJson.name: Anti-VEGF treatment and kidney failure (on-treatment, after 3rd exposure)

targetCohort.name: Monthly intravitreal anti-VEGF (ranibizumab, aflibercept, bevacizumab) - new users

conceptsToInclude.name: Large-scale baseline covariates (demographics, comorbidities, medications, procedures, labs)

timeAtRisks.description: On-treatment risk window beginning after third anti-VEGF exposure
As-treated: time-to-first event (follow-up until end of assigned treatment, end of observation, event, or censoring)

On-treatment: from index date until outcome, treatment discontinuation (allowing 90-day gaps between consecutive prescriptions; discontinuation date = end date of last prescription), switch to another oral anticoagulant (apixaban, dabigatran, edoxaban, rivaroxaban, or warfarin), death, or study end (31Dec2019), whichever comes first
Intention-to-treat (sensitivity): from index date until outcome, death, or study end (31Dec2019); do not censor at treatment discontinuation or switching

psSettings.description: PS stratification (primary): 5 strata to estimate average treatment effect
PS matching (sensitivity): variable-ratio matching to estimate average treatment effect on treated

conceptsToExclude.name: Intensive services (mechanical ventilation, tracheostomy, extracorporeal membrane oxygenation)

targetCohort.name: Ranitidine users >30 days, age >=20, 365d prior observation, exclude prior cancer and other H2RA exposure within 365d

conceptsToExclude.name: Other H2RA exposure within 365 days prior to cohort entry

predJson.name: Janssen (Ad26.COV2.S) first dose vs Moderna (mRNA-1273) and Pfizer (BNT162b2) first doses - population-level estimation

comparatorCohort.name: Moderna mRNA-1273 and Pfizer BNT162b2 (first doses; separate comparisons)

predJson.name: Effect of T2D medication initiators on NAION (new-user, PS-matched)

targetCohort.name: Initiators of target T2D medication (e.g., semaglutide)

comparatorCohort.name: Initiators of comparator T2D medication (e.g., dulaglutide)

timeAtRisks.description: On-treatment: from initiation until end of continuous exposure (gap > 30 days) or end of observation
On-treatment (start day after cohort entry until treatment discontinuation/switch, outcome, end of enrollment, or end of study)

psSettings.description: Sentinel PS replication (1:1 matching on PS from Sentinel 31 covariates)
Adapted large-scale regularized PS (LASSO) with 1:10 variable ratio matching

timeAtRisks.description: 1-year (primary) - from 1 day after index to 365 days
5-year - from 1 day after index to 1825 days
On-treatment (allowing 7-day gap) - from 1 day after index until end of persistent exposure

predJson.name: Target vs Comparator - OT and ITT, 365d washout

timeAtRisks.description: On-treatment (OT): from index to end of treatment (based on days' supply), allowing up to 30-day gaps; censored at death, DB exit, age 89, 365 days from index, or exposure to the other opioid of interest
Intent-to-treat (ITT): from index until death, DB exit, or outcome (up to 365 days)

predJson.name: Population-level estimation - new user active comparator
